text: @WalshFreedom I keep seeing Facebook 10-item “challenges” to distract us from #COVID19. How about a 10-item #TrumpScandalChallenge?  He’s done so many things we need all the pundits to make their top ten lists. We would need subcategories: racism, foreign policy, corruption, environment, etc.
